basic_information.scholarship_name: W. Roger Webb Endowed Scholarship for Criminal Justice or Counter-Terrorism

description: This scholarship recognizes a Criminal Justice student who shows passion and commitment to their chosen major as evidenced by strong academic performance. Eligibility Requirements Minimum 3.0 GPA Enrolled full-time Criminal Justice major Continuing in the fall semester that the scholarship is awarded

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
